column1: Art Institute of Chicago////My only disappointment was portions of the modern wing.  The building itself is gorgeous and a work of art.  But many of the modern art pieces are truly unremarkable.  Or rather
column2: the only remarkable thing about them is that someone considered them worthy to hang in this fabulous museum.  On the positive side
column3: I did get a few ideas of "art" that I can create myself to cover a large wall in our family room!  LOL!
